description: Seems simple enough but Librevault has no help file, and the cursor-triggered hints aren't nearly helpful enough. I suppose there might be some information at github or wherever, but there is not even a link to that offered in the program. Where to start? I uninstalled the program.
Hängt sich dauernt auf und auf der webseite ist nor das logo zu sehen ansonsten keinerlei Infos
